metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39616 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: AOMedia v3.0.0 to v3.5.0 was discovered to contain an invalid read memory access via the component assign_frame_buffer_p in av1/common/av1_common_int.h.

notes.Note: alexmurray> QtWebengine contains a vendored copy of aomedia

criterions.comment: qt6-webengine package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
